about.title: About Me
about.msg1: Hi there! I am Ayush Kumar Gupta, a passionate software developer with 6 years of experience specializing in Web Development and building scalable, user-friendly digital solutions.
about.msg2: With expertise in JavaScript, Angular, and React, I have successfully developed several web portals and platforms, enhancing both user experience and system performance.
about.msg3: In my previous roles, I contributed to the development of ERP solutions at Epicor Software, focusing on inventory management, e-commerce, and warehouse mobility. I also designed advanced UI components and optimized API integrations, driving performance improvements. Additionally, I worked at Appinness Interactive Ltd, creating dynamic ad platforms with custom image-handling features.
about.msg4: Currently, I am pursuing a Master’s in Computer Science at City University of Seattle, with a focus on Cloud Computing. Alongside my studies, I’m expanding my knowledge in AWS through the AWS Academy course to align my skills with modern cloud-based architectures. My goal is to grow into SDE2/SDE3 roles, leveraging my technical and collaborative experience to build impactful solutions at scale.
